heroDescription: Start connecting with your friends and adventures in the easiest and smartest way. Download the app and plan your outings now.
heroBannerInsight1: The first Mexican social network focused on your adventures
heroBannerInsight2: It features over 1,000 places, events, and activities to explore
heroBannerInsight3: It's the only thing you need to make plans with your friends :)
whatIsThisSectionTitle2: Plan outings with your friends in 3 simple steps.
